sentences.sContent: Unitary elasticity is the coincidental case that is just on the borderline between elastic and inelastic .
sentences.sContent_eng: Unitary elasticity is the coincidental case that is just on the borderline between elastic and inelastic .
sentences.sCn: 关于单弹性是一种巧合。这种巧合是有弹性和缺乏弹性的分界线。

sentences.sContent: In addition the room for manoeuvre in the reserve position would become increasingly inelastic towards the end of the maintenance period.
sentences.sContent_eng: In addition the room for manoeuvre in the reserve position would become increasingly inelastic towards the end of the maintenance period.
sentences.sCn: 此外，在储备维持期将近结束时，银行调配储备的空间将会愈来愈缺乏弹性。

synos.tran: [力]无弹性的；无适应性的；不能适应的

phrases.pCn: 非弹性变形，非弹性形变

remMethod.val: in(不) + elastic(有弹性的) → 无弹性的

words.tran: 不适应性；坚硬性；无弹力
